name: Amx Netlinx Phoenix Music
short_description:
Phoenix Music 'Lite' is a Windows Mediaplayer (xp/7/8) remotly controlled by AMX NetLinx. (and in development for Iridium mobile) 
This media player is written to provide a quick (and  reliable) solution to my customers. 
Phoenix Music can : 
- Play mp3, wma,ogg,flac a m3u
- Large management of TuneIn radio as Play, Add Preset, Remove Preset, Search for Radio, ....
All of this completly controlled by AMX Moderos.

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Emulation and API Compatibility :: WINE
Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 32-bit MS Windows (NT/2000/XP)
Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 64-bit MS Windows
